block.code: function onOpen() {            var url = util.format('http://www.libxl.com/download/%s', getArchiveName());            console.log('Downloading ' + url);            http.get(url, function(response) {                if (response.statusCode !== 200) {                    dieOnError(new Error(util.format('request failed: %s %s', response.statusCode, response.statusMessage)));                }                response.on('error', dieOnError);                writer.on('finish', function() {                   callback(filename);                });                response.pipe(writer);            }).on('error', dieOnError);        }
